The humor in this image comes from a relatable situation many face when watching TV or movies: the volume mismatch between dialogue and action scenes. 

On the left, a person is watching a TV with low volume during a dialogue scene, which might be hard to hear without turning up the volume. On the right, another person is overwhelmed by the loud volume of an action scene, which seems to be excessively high. 

This contrast highlights the common issue where viewers constantly adjust the volume due to quiet dialogues and booming action scenes, leading to a humorous and satirical depiction of the struggle to find a balanced volume setting.
